module.name: Queues
module.description: Creates a queue where calls are placed on hold and answered on a first-in, first-out basis. Many options are available, including ring strategy for agents, caller announcements, max wait times, etc.
module.changelog: *2.2.2* Disallow Queue 0 (#1487) *2.2.1* Add NODEST to tell children NOT to go to destinations (like voicemail or other) - helps with followme in a queue *2.2* First release for FreePBX 2.2 - Fixed compatibility issue with new UI
